channel.title: How to connect to a server on hamachi
channel.description: How do i connect to server using Hamachi... im on the network but dont know how to load the server

item.title: How to connect to a server on hamachi
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Dont make your title sound like a tutorial, and all you to is turn on hamachi and go to the triangle thing and click create network. create a username and pass (simple ones people use this to get on your server) and then when there on your network tell them the white IP at the top and you server port and they can logg in.

Read full topic
item.source: How to connect to a server on hamachi

item.title: How to connect to a server on hamachi
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Go onto MoparScape WebClient/Client and connect through the owner’s IP which you can veiw by opening Hamachi. You’ll also have to make sure you’re using the correct port.

Read full topic
